page.title: 20Parish Council - Calstock
page.content: The Calstock Parish Council, which was formed in 1894, now has 15 members, 5 from Gunnislake, 3 from Calstock, 2 from Harrowbarrow, 4 from Delaware and 1 from Metherell. Soon there will be 17 members.In 1984 there was a count of the people in our parish and the total was 5200. The council gets Â£2600 to spend for public lighting, parks, public footpaths and open spaces. At present the Manpower Services have built a tennis court and improved the Recreation Field. When the council has meetings it has them in Delaware Primary School. The council takes complaints from the public and sends them to the District or County Councils. The Council is trying to make a scheme to repair the Public Hall at Gunnislake. It has also given Â£1000 to help build a new Village Hall at Harrowbarrow.
